artist: Artist: Jean-Pierre Norblin de la Gourdaine
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: nude woman at center, collapsed between two male figures; older man at L, with beard, reaches over woman, with his hand near PR breast; male at R appears to be struggling to support the woman; the figures are between trees on a raised stone platform
provenance: John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie; gave to MIA, 2015. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: signed and dated at left (on wall end): [Norblin fec., 1776]
title: Susanna and the Elders
